mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_POST ( title, content, url, user_no, board_type, created_at, last_modified_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{url}, #{user_no}, #{board_type}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, url, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, DATE_FORMAT(last_modified_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_modified_at, CAST(seq AS CHAR) AS seq FROM B_POST WHERE board_type = 'Notice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT title, content, url, state, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, DATE_FORMAT(last_modified_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_modified_at, CAST(seq AS CHAR) AS seq, CAST(user_no AS CHAR) AS user_no, CAST(board_type AS CHAR) AS board_type FROM B_POST WHERE seq = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE B_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, url = #{url}, last_modified_at = sysdate() WHERE seq = #{boardId};
